website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Surveyor 3 is designed for overpronators. It offers cushioning, support and smooth ride on both light and rough trail. Overpronators will surely love the stable platform of this shoe to achieve a great running experience. Though it received both positive and negative feedback, it is still safe to say that the Surveyor 3 is a winning release.
pros: It features a removable sockliner for added comfort and cushioning
Some runners liked the durable construction of the Gel Surveyor 3
The gel cushioning in the rearfoot and forefoot promotes a smooth transition, remarked quite a number of runners
Several runners noticed the enhanced stability and support of this shoe
As noted in some reviews, this shoe is comfortable to wear
Based on a couple of reviews, the transition is effortless and efficient
cons: The Asics Gel Surveyor 3 is an expensive shoe
Lacks cushioning based on some runners experience
The toe box is too narrow for some runners

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers for daily use or work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sneakers for daily use or work. Good for workout at gym. Uncomfortable for running after 2 miles.limited bending with long distance running. Hard on the knee on hard surface.good on treadmill
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for running/walking or standing in.
customer_reviews.text: I probably could wear them all day. I have 'house' shoes & 'out in the world' or running/walking shoes which these are. I appreciate how my feet/heels feel in these & my posture improves. They provide stability, support & comfort all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MR. Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: good product for fat hawaiian feet. Gel is a must and this is a higher end asics. SHoebacca was fast shipping- days early
customer_reviews.text: good replacement for kayanos. Husband was on 3rd pair of kayanos and this looks and feels the same for a bit less. Great for overpronators with wide feet. Will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: tkea

customer_reviews.title: Good ole asics
customer_reviews.text: Same good quality that Ive always gotten with asics, im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob54

customer_reviews.title: Good All-around shoe for walking and gym
customer_reviews.text: Hubs wears these to walk and for the gym. Bought first pair from Zappos and got this second pair cheaper from Amazon. Shoes have a moderate amount of cushioning, no real correction for pronation or odd foot issues. Just a basic exercise shoe, which was what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: El Pee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly good running shoes, but are great as everyday shoes. They fit great and are very comfortable. This is my second pair and haven't found shoes that look as good and feel right.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Manning

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use to run, very comfortable and durable. Perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Portes

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sneaker very comfortable and very similar to the nimbus model. the price was incredibly low for that model and includings fast shipping, Really amazing deal I love amazon. I may never see the inside of a box store ever again.
customer_reviews.author: WJD

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fairly comfortable and provide cushion
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fairly comfortable and provide cushion. They are a little loose on the inside of the foot. I developed some small blisters on the inside part of my heel. But I think it's due to normal wear and tear as I get used to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: One of the better pairs of sneakers I've had in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better pairs of sneakers I've had in a long time as far as comfort goes. The only thing I was disappointed with is that I do not feel like they held up to wear as well as some past sneakers have.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Running on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I swear by the ASICS Surveyor, I’ve bought them in all colors for both of us. Dream shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: The only thing surprising was that this was a few ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing surprising was that this was a few ounces heavier than expected. Not a very heavy shoe, but in comparison to other ASICS running shoes I've gotten in the past, this was a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic301

customer_reviews.title: The 13 was perfect and I love them
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a size larger than I would normally. I usually order a 12 and ordered a 13 because my brother had gotten a pair and said the size ran short. The 13 was perfect and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be my go to brand
customer_reviews.text: I like the wide toe space, comfortable from the first time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: light weight and looks sturdy but the laces are short and do not tie up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh Pokharel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My knees love these running/walking shoes. Too bad they discontinued them. I bought this pair as a back up .
customer_reviews.author: charles levy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great. I wear them all day running, lifting, and all the other physical activites a day can bring without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Walter M

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sneakers. Multi functional - gym, running and walking. In addition to the functionality very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. My son wears them everyday. He has terrible feet that hurt him all the time. These shoes seem to help him a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: A great running shoe and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've ran in Asics since they were called Tiger and had the original GT. These are one of the best shoes in the line up.
customer_reviews.author: Jimster

customer_reviews.title: It is a great pair of tennis shoes and a good deal
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pair of tennis shoes and a good deal. My husband is very happy with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Solano F

customer_reviews.title: These running shoes are perfect for me some motion control
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are perfect for me some motion control, good room in the toe-box and respectable cushioning they are a bit heavy but I prefer the sense of sturdiness that they have
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Enright

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my fiancé for Xmas. He says they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fiancé for Xmas. He says they fit well and are very comfy. Hard finding a size 15, but he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Cindy~

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! I only buy Asics for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I only buy Asics for my son. They are the only shoes he can wear that don't hurt his feet. Amazon has a great price on them too!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They provide good arch support for me, but I still need to add in the extra support insert if I want to go running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fit as expected. Price was more competitive than anywhere else I could find the same shoe. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had many pair of Asics and these are my favorite by far
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pair of Asics and these are my favorite by far. I love the color and the fit. I stand for 12 hour shifts and they always keep my feet nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable out of the box shoe you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Nice looking !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son-in-law. He says they are comfortable and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: debhi

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable w/ good
customer_reviews.text: I use them only for running. very comfortable w/ good support
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Wouters

customer_reviews.title: great product,
customer_reviews.text: Actually, my husband loves them, Asics have been his favorite for years.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! Good support on the arch. Nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good, lightweight running shoe. Seems sturdy and well built. The insole is comfortable and stands up to wear. The size and fit are exact to what I wear. I have worn them on several occasions, for all day wear and not just exercise, with no problems. The laces are a good length, not too long or too short, but I do have to knot them because of they tend to come loose. Plenty of light reflectivity for the safety aspect. Just so you know, they are a little shiny.
customer_reviews.author: FBW

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Shipping was a day longer than promised by prime. But the shoes are worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Comfortable and supportive. ASICS fit my feet well over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Borne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe. Runs a little short and narrow, hoping it stretches a tiny bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cose

customer_reviews.title: legit!
customer_reviews.text: I'd rate them a 4.5/5. Very solid running shoes. Have used for 6 months and they are still in nice shape. Would buy again. The arch support is very good. My only issue is the soles; my feet tend to slide a slight amount while running.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: After two months of fairly limited use one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: After two months of fairly limited use one of the soles has begun to separate from the shoe - clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and for the price! . Wife wants a pair. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am flat-footed and every pair I have ever bough had great arch support
customer_reviews.text: After trying my first pair of ASICS shoes they are the only athletic shoes I will buy. I am flat-footed and every pair I have ever bough had great arch support. I read that that is mainly due to the arch support being a part of the rubber bottom of the shoe - not just some mounded cushion that eventually gets mashed down, so the arch support lasts. They are very comfortable and light shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe - Not so great on lateral support
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable shoe for running since the composition of the heel is almost 100% gel. The toe box is very wide and it has solid arch support. The only thing I would ding this on is the heel is fairly narrow and if you have a lot of lateral movement in your step you could roll your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Badger

customer_reviews.title: Always love the ASICS gel line
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing ASICS gel shoes for a long time, these are by far my favorite pair! I use them mainly for cycling and walking on pavement, so I can't attest to how they wear on more rugged trails. All I can say about their durability is I will most likely wear them for a couple of years, or until they're in tatters. They wear well for me.
customer_reviews.author: 4.a.coder

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I use them as my everyday shoes, and they work great for walking or standing. I haven't used them for running, so I can't say how good they are on that front. My only dislike is that they are not as breathe-able as the Gel-Excite 2 shoes, but that isn't a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The best tennis shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this shoe! it is by far the best tennis shoe I have ever owned. I have spent $100's on looking for a pair that don't hurt my feet by the end of a work day and these are it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gilde

customer_reviews.title: Great Stability and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Moved up from the ASICS GT-1000 to the Surveyor a few months ago, and this is my second pair of the Surveyor. The GT-1000 is a very good shoe, but the Surveyor seems to provide more stability and forefoot cushioning for this slight overpronator. Fit is the same as the GT-1000, and they both wear well. Most comfortable running shoe I have worn and also suitable for light trail hiking. I will buy another pair when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bargain
customer_reviews.text: Asics quality at a reasonable price... Very comfortable and durable.. Nothing els to say.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Best combination of cushioning and stability
customer_reviews.text: I have special needs for shoes. I need the right mix of cushioning and stability. Among all the shoes I have bought over the years, these have served my needs the best.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Altekar

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have purchased - they are very comfortable. I purchased these to save until my old pair wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Lonny H

customer_reviews.title: Like size 15 running shoe
customer_reviews.text: First 2 weeks feel great. for both walking an running.
customer_reviews.author: Brink Bloembergen

customer_reviews.title: The extra padding in the show made it feel snug ...
customer_reviews.text: The extra padding in the show made it feel snug. I tried the gel-evate 2, and they felt true to the size.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kitchens

product_meta.title: ASICS mens GEL-Surveyor 3-M Gel-surveyorTM 3-m
product_meta.description: There's no need to mull over the decision to lace into the ASICS® GEL-Surveyor™ 3. One stride in its pillowy plush and stable platform is sure to make you a true believer! Successor to the GEL-Surveyor 2 (no longer available). Built for the moderate overpronator who requires a combination of enhanced cushioning and stability. Breathable mesh upper with synthetic overlays. Plush tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Removable foam footbed. ComforDry™ sockliner provides cushioning performance and anti-odor properties for a cooler, drier, healthier environment. I.G.S® (Impact Guidance System) is an ASICS design philosophy that employs linked componentry to enhance the foot's natural gait from heel strike through toe-off. FluidRide™ midsole provides the ultimate combination of bounce back and cushioning properties with reduced weight and exceptional durability. Rearfoot & forefoot GEL® cushioning systems work together to better attenuate impacting shock and allow the foot to move fluidly throughout the gait cycle. Dynamic DuoMax® System increases stability and support with reduced weight and enhanced platform comfort. Midsole Height:Heel/Toe: 22 mm/12 mmDifferential: 10 mm AHAR® rubber is known for its supreme durability and is strategically placed throughout high-wear areas of the outsole. Guidance Trusstic System® integrates Guidance Line® construction to enhance gait efficiency while promoting mid-foot structural integrity. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Stability running shoe engineered to support moderate overpronation featuring high-gloss overlays and reflective details
Guidance Line flex grooves in outsole
